meta.description: Determine the minimum number of waitstaff required to meet the minimum staffing requirements for each time period in a 24-hour restaurant operation.

sets.name: TIME_PERIODS
sets.description: Time periods during which the restaurant operates.

params.name: min_waitstaff
params.description: Minimum number of waitstaff required for each time period.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of waitstaff starting their shift at the beginning of each time period.

objective.name: min_total_waitstaff
objective.description: Minimize the total number of waitstaff scheduled.

constraints.name: min_staff_2am_6am
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 2am-6am is met.

constraints.name: min_staff_6am_10am
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 6am-10am is met.

constraints.name: min_staff_10am_2pm
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 10am-2pm is met.

constraints.name: min_staff_2pm_6pm
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 2pm-6pm is met.

constraints.name: min_staff_6pm_10pm
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 6pm-10pm is met.

constraints.name: min_staff_10pm_2am
constraints.description: Ensure minimum waitstaff requirement for 10pm-2am is met.
